Product Description

Official Jeep Merchandise

There’s Only One! The Jeep brand’s unique Go Anywhere, Do Anything spirit is now available on the official store. Shop authentic Jeep gear and merchandise specifically designed for you to experience your life’s adventure.

For 80 years, the Jeep brand has been an undeniable symbol of freedom and adventure. Our branded products give you the chance to explore and enjoy every corner of this rugged, yet refined world.

Apparel

Accessories

Gear

Product Category
Apparel Tool GPS Device Accessories

Series
Jeep: Apparel Jeep: Travel Jeep: Tech Jeep: Lifestyle

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.41 x 8.54 x 1.54 inches; 6.74 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 8, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08KTM72HQ

Machine Wash
Human’s Best Friend = Dog + Jeep. Show your love for your favorite things in our Jeep by JEDCO “Copilot” t-shirt. Created for ultimate comfort, this soft-washed garment-dyed shirt provides the softness you crave and the look that will never go out of style.
MADE OF: 100% ring spun cotton. Heavyweight 6.1 oz Fabric. Soft-Washed Garment-Dyed Fabric. High-Quality Screen-Printed Artwork that will Withstand Hundreds of Washes.
FIT: Twill Taped Neck and Shoulders. Double-Needle Collar, Armhole, Sleeves, and Bottom Hems.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine wash with like colors. Only non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low. Do not iron.
OFFICALLY LICENSED: Jeep and the Jeep grille are registered trademarks of FCA US LLC.

Read more

item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.15
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:40 UTC – Details)


Super-light HeatGear® fabric delivers superior coverage without weighing you down. Mesh underarm & back panels for strategic ventilation. Ergonomic design keeps seams off high abrasion areas & increases durability. Hybrid raglan sleeve construction for added range of motion & comfort. Compression: Ultra-tight, second-skin fit. Body: 84% Polyester/16% Elastane. Mesh: 92% Polyester/8% Elastane.Fit & Care:
Machine wash cold with like colors
Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed
Tumble dry low
Do not iron.
Do not use softeners.
Do not dry clean.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.25 x 7.6 x 2.68 inches; 4.16 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1361524
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 18, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Under Armour
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09JNFSH93

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
Super-light HeatGear fabric delivers superior coverage without weighing you down
Mesh underarm & back panels for strategic ventilation
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast

Under Armour Men’s HeatGear Compression Long-Sleeve

HeatGear Armour is our original performance baselayer—the one you put on first and take off last. So we made it extra comfortable by wicking sweat and stretching so you can move no matter what.

  • Compression: Ultra-tight, second-skin fit.
  • Super-light HeatGear fabric delivers superior coverage without weighing you down
  • Mesh underarm & back panels for strategic ventilation
  • Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
  • Ergonomic design keeps seams off high abrasion areas & increases durability
  • Hybrid raglan sleeve construction for added range of motion & comfort

Read more

HEATGEAR
COLDGEAR
What’s it do? KEEPS YOU COOL KEEPS YOU WARM

✓

item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:06:35 UTC – Details)


If you’re from Buffalo, then you know the 716! It’s been the nickname of the nickel city for decades and now you can wear it proud. BFLO is our town so brag about B-Lo with this cool shirt! Great gift for anyone from Western New York WNY. You’ll love the vintage design with the distressed buffalo and 716 in the middle.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10 x 8 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 19, 2017
